title: Lak93xy
author: Lak93xy
content: Are you going to pay $8 a month to Elon Musk? This is going to be the new charge for the blue tick.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h2mnlOfrBuI

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: Not at all we are going to pay at all $8 for free of cost..

comments.author: Qaisrani1
comments.body: Nope not at all we are not paying $8 per month to Elon Musk because he is not charging it right.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I am certainly not going to pay for a blue tick. I don’t see any positives in having one unless the old way, you are a celebrity or public figure. Any random guy can have a blue tick now & I don’t see anything good that you get for it.I have actually seen memes of people making fun of dudes who pay for the blue tick. I definitely won’t be getting one.

comments.author: Jet Cash
comments.body: Wikipedia defines a tick as "Ticks (order Ixodida) are parasitic arachnids that are part of the mite superorder ". I haven't ever heard Elon Musk described as such a thing.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.created_time: March 08, 2023, 05:16:29 PMLast edit: March 08, 2023, 06:00:54 PM by DeathAngel
comments.body: Quote from: Jet Cash on March 08, 2023, 10:20:11 AMWikipedia defines a tick as "Ticks (order Ixodida) are parasitic arachnids that are part of the mite superorder ". I haven't ever heard Elon Musk described as such a thing. UK people call it a Blue Tick, Jet Cash. I think check mark is the more popular, Americanised term but yeah, it’s commonly referred to Blue Tick by people in the UK.https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Twitter_verification

comments.author: Bus33
comments.body: No way .That is not quite right. He has no right to charge $8 for free of cost..

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well I do not use twitter that often or for business purpose. Also I only have a very few followers. So, I do not think that paying the eight dollars a month is worth it at all for a regular person like me. I do think that for businesses it is worth purchasing the Twitter Blue subscription. This way, Twitter can provide a better resource of news and get rid of lying people.
